title: Fashion History Mystery #36: The Japanese Origins of the "Flip-Flop"
itunes:title: Fashion History Mystery #36: The Japanese Origins of the "Flip-Flop"
description:
From Japan to Hawaii to California, this week we learn about the origins of the ubiquitious flip-flop.
